title: ?dEvi shrI kAmAkSi
sahitya:
dEvi shrI kAmAkSi tarunamIdamma tripurasundari tanayuni brocuTaku


anupallavi

  Avirbhava shrI kalasha rUpini Anandabhairavi Adi parasakti


caraNam    maNi mantra hariNi mangaLa rUpiNi madhukara bhASiNi marakatAngi rANi 
shivuniki rANi (purANi) kalyANi karuNAkari shivasankari srikari shyAmakrSNa sOdari
